tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE improv_group ( 
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    show_date DATE, 
    show_time TIME, 
    venue VARCHAR(255), 
    audience_feedback TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    audience_capacity INT
);
CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_id INT,
    audience_member_name VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  feedback_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE performers (
  performer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_schedule (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_date DATE,
    show_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    performer_name VARCHAR(255),
    is_cancelled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE performer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performer_name VARCHAR(255),
    performance_rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audience_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id INT,
    audience_name VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performer_schedule (
    performer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performer_name VARCHAR(255),
    show_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_id UUID NOT NULL,
  performer_id UUID NOT NULL,
  show_date DATE NOT NULL,
  show_time TIME NOT NULL
);
